content:
Decided to go ahead and open a draft pr for the locking/bundling of components, in case anybody wants to check it out. Thought we could also maybe discuss a little more whether the goal should be to get it merged in wasm-tools or the registry code. https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasm-tools/pull/1166

Lock components and bundle components by macovedj 路 Pull Request #1166 路 bytecodealliance/wasm-tools
Enables the ability to create a locked component, referencing all nested imports of registry dependencies, as well as bundled components, which contain the contents of nested registry dependencies....
